title: Virtual Media Folders
description: Virtual Media Folders brings folder organization to your WordPress Media Library. Organize your media files into hierarchical folders without moving files on disk. Folders are virtual, so your URLs never change.

children.title: Virtual Media Folders - Add-On Manager
children.description: üöÄ Install and manage add-ons that extend Virtual Media Folders.

children.title: Virtual Media Folders - AI Organizer
children.description: Uses vision-capable AI models to analyze actual image content and automatically organize your media library into virtual folders. This is add-on functionality requiring an API key from a supported AI service provider, or a local LLM.

children.title: Virtual Media Folders - Rules Engine
children.description: Rule-based automatic folder assignment for media uploads, based on metadata, file type, or other criteria.

children.title: Virtual Media Folders - Editorial Workflow
children.description: Role-based folder access, move restrictions, and Inbox workflow for Virtual Media Folders.

children.title: Virtual Media Folders - Media Cleanup
children.description: Tools to identify and clean up unused or duplicate media files.

children.title: Virtual Media Folders - Folder Exporter
children.description: Export folders (or subtrees) as ZIP archives with optional CSV manifests.

title: :construction: AI Experiments :construction:
description: Very beta projects exploring the use of AI in WordPress.
